using System.IO;
using AsyncGenerator.TestCases;

namespace AsyncGenerator.Tests.SimpleReference.Input
{
	using System.Threading.Tasks;
	/// <summary>
	/// A simple example of using <see cref="SimpleFile.Read"/>
	/// </summary>
	public partial class TestCase
	{
		public Task CallCallReadFileAsync()
		{
			return CallReadFileAsync();
		}

		public Task CallReadFileAsync()
		{
			return ReadFileAsync();
		}

		/// <summary>
		/// Use <see cref="SimpleFile.ReadAsync()"/> to read a file
		/// </summary>
		public Task ReadFileAsync()
		{
			return SimpleFile.ReadAsync();
		}

	}
}
